name: ISO/IEC 27001:2022 Full Standard Overview
description: Clauses 4-10 requirements and Annex A controls (93). Suitable for ISMS compliance dashboards in Wazuh.

clauses.title: Context of the organization
clauses.description: Determine external and internal issues relevant to the purpose of the organization and that affect its ability to achieve the intended outcome(s) of its ISMS.

clauses.title: Leadership
clauses.description: Top management shall demonstrate leadership and commitment with respect to the ISMS, establish policy, and assign roles and responsibilities.

clauses.title: Planning
clauses.description: Plan actions to address risks and opportunities, establish information security objectives, and plan how to achieve them, including risk assessment and treatment.

clauses.title: Support
clauses.description: Ensure resources, competence, awareness, communication, and documented information necessary for the ISMS are available and effective.

clauses.title: Operation
clauses.description: Plan, implement and control the processes needed to meet information security requirements and to implement the actions determined in Clause 6.

clauses.title: Performance evaluation
clauses.description: Monitor, measure, analyse and evaluate the ISMS; conduct internal audits; perform management review.

clauses.title: Improvement
clauses.description: Identify and act on nonconformities and take corrective action. Continually improve the suitability, adequacy and effectiveness of the ISMS.

annex_a.title: Policies for information security
annex_a.description: Information security policy and topic-specific policies shall be defined, approved by management, published, communicated, and reviewed at planned intervals.

annex_a.title: Information security roles and responsibilities
annex_a.description: Responsibilities for information security shall be defined and allocated.

annex_a.title: Segregation of duties
annex_a.description: Conflicting duties and areas of responsibility shall be segregated to reduce opportunities for unauthorized or unintentional modification or misuse of assets.

annex_a.title: Management responsibilities
annex_a.description: Management shall require personnel to apply information security in accordance with policies and procedures.

annex_a.title: Contact with authorities
annex_a.description: The organization shall establish and maintain contact with relevant authorities.

annex_a.title: Contact with special interest groups
annex_a.description: The organization shall establish and maintain contact with special interest groups and professional associations.

annex_a.title: Threat intelligence
annex_a.description: Collect and analyse information relating to information security threats to produce threat intelligence.

annex_a.title: Information security in project management
annex_a.description: Information security shall be integrated into project management.

annex_a.title: Inventory of information and other associated assets
annex_a.description: An inventory of information and associated assets, including owners, shall be developed and maintained.

annex_a.title: Acceptable use of information and other associated assets
annex_a.description: Rules for the acceptable use of information and associated assets shall be identified, documented, and implemented.

annex_a.title: Return of assets
annex_a.description: Personnel and interested parties shall return all organization assets in their possession upon termination of employment, contract or agreement.

annex_a.title: Classification of information
annex_a.description: Information shall be classified according to the organisation’s classification scheme.

annex_a.title: Labelling of information
annex_a.description: Information shall be labelled in terms of classification and handling requirements.

annex_a.title: Information transfer
annex_a.description: Transfer of information shall be protected from unauthorized access, copying, modification or misuse.

annex_a.title: Access control
annex_a.description: Access to information and associated assets shall be limited to authorized users, processes, or devices.

annex_a.title: Identity management
annex_a.description: Processes and responsibilities shall be established for identity management, including unique IDs.

annex_a.title: Authentication information
annex_a.description: Allocation and management of authentication information shall be controlled and secure.

annex_a.title: Access rights
annex_a.description: Access rights shall be provisioned, reviewed, adjusted, and removed according to policies.

annex_a.title: Information security in supplier relationships
annex_a.description: Processes shall be defined and implemented to manage information security in supplier relationships.

annex_a.title: Addressing information security within supplier agreements
annex_a.description: Relevant information security requirements shall be established and agreed with each supplier.

annex_a.title: Managing information security in the ICT supply chain
annex_a.description: Processes shall be defined to manage information security risks associated with the ICT supply chain.

annex_a.title: Monitoring, review and change management of supplier services
annex_a.description: Regularly monitor, review, and manage changes to supplier services.

annex_a.title: Information security for use of cloud services
annex_a.description: Establish processes for acquisition, use, and management of cloud services with information security considerations.

annex_a.title: Information security incident management planning and preparation
annex_a.description: Plan and prepare for managing information security incidents.

annex_a.title: Assessment and decision on information security events
annex_a.description: Assess events and decide if they are to be classified as incidents.

annex_a.title: Response to information security incidents
annex_a.description: Respond to information security incidents according to documented procedures.

annex_a.title: Learning from information security incidents
annex_a.description: Use lessons learned from incidents to reduce likelihood or impact of future incidents.

annex_a.title: Collection of evidence
annex_a.description: Establish procedures for identification, collection, acquisition and preservation of evidence related to security events.

annex_a.title: Information security during disruption
annex_a.description: Plan how to maintain information security during disruptions.

annex_a.title: ICT readiness for business continuity
annex_a.description: Plan, implement, maintain and test ICT readiness for business continuity.

annex_a.title: Legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements
annex_a.description: Identify and keep up to date all relevant legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements.

annex_a.title: Intellectual property rights
annex_a.description: Implement procedures to protect intellectual property rights.

annex_a.title: Protection of records
annex_a.description: Protect records from loss, destruction, falsification, unauthorized access and release.

annex_a.title: Privacy and protection of personally identifiable information (PII)
annex_a.description: Identify and apply requirements regarding privacy and protection of PII.

annex_a.title: Independent review of information security
annex_a.description: Independently review the organisation’s approach to information security at planned intervals.

annex_a.title: Compliance with policies, rules and standards for information security
annex_a.description: Ensure personnel comply with information security policies, rules and standards.

annex_a.title: Documented operating procedures
annex_a.description: Document operating procedures and make them available to personnel who need them.

annex_a.title: Screening
annex_a.description: Carry out background verification checks on candidates for employment where appropriate.

annex_a.title: Terms and conditions of employment
annex_a.description: Contractual agreements shall state employees’ and contractors’ information security responsibilities.

annex_a.title: Information security awareness, education and training
annex_a.description: Provide appropriate awareness, education and training to employees and contractors.

annex_a.title: Disciplinary process
annex_a.description: Establish a formal disciplinary process for information security breaches.

annex_a.title: Responsibilities after termination or change of employment
annex_a.description: Ensure responsibilities for information security remain after termination or change of employment.

annex_a.title: Confidentiality or non-disclosure agreements
annex_a.description: Use confidentiality or non-disclosure agreements where appropriate.

annex_a.title: Remote working
annex_a.description: Establish controls for secure remote working arrangements.

annex_a.title: Information security event reporting
annex_a.description: Ensure personnel know how to report information security events and weaknesses.

annex_a.title: Physical security perimeters
annex_a.description: Define and use physical security perimeters to protect areas containing sensitive information.

annex_a.title: Physical entry
annex_a.description: Protect secure areas with appropriate entry controls.

annex_a.title: Securing offices, rooms and facilities
annex_a.description: Physically protect offices, rooms and facilities.

annex_a.title: Physical security monitoring
annex_a.description: Monitor premises to detect unauthorized access.

annex_a.title: Protecting against physical and environmental threats
annex_a.description: Implement protection against natural disasters, malicious attack or accidents.

annex_a.title: Working in secure areas
annex_a.description: Design procedures for working in secure areas.

annex_a.title: Clear desk and clear screen
annex_a.description: Implement a clear desk and clear screen policy.

annex_a.title: Equipment siting and protection
annex_a.description: Site equipment to reduce risks and protect it appropriately.

annex_a.title: Security of assets off-premises
annex_a.description: Protect assets that are used outside the organisation’s premises.

annex_a.title: Storage media
annex_a.description: Protect storage media and control its use and handling.

annex_a.title: Supporting utilities
annex_a.description: Protect supporting utilities (power, water, HVAC) required for secure operations.

annex_a.title: Cabling security
annex_a.description: Protect cabling carrying sensitive information from interception or damage.

annex_a.title: Equipment maintenance
annex_a.description: Maintain equipment to ensure its continued secure operation.

annex_a.title: Secure disposal or re-use of equipment
annex_a.description: Ensure secure disposal or re-use of equipment to prevent data leakage.
